page.title: 06HEALTH IN PROBUS
page.content: {Health Care in the Probus Area} About 30 years ago Probus had 3 doctors in practise with consulting & waiting rooms behind one doctor's house.Now with the increase in population there are 4 doctors with a new,attractively airy,purpose_built surgery on the edge of the village.It was suggested that the field it overlooked should become a cemetery but after consideration this was not considered appropriate!They do their own dispensing as there is no chemist in the village & the dispensary window is well_barred as is necessary nowa_ days.They have weekly diabetic,infant welfare,family_planning & "Well Women" clinics & also a chiropody service. Nowadays there is greater emphasis on preventative medicine as people are willing to consult their doctors more frequently.
